text:
(a)  
Sec 13(b)(22)
provided an OT exemption for "Any agricultural employee employed in the
growing and harvesting of shade-grown tobacco who is engaged in the processing
(including, but not limited to, drying, curing, fermenting, bulking, rebulking,
sorting, grading, aging, and baling) of such tobacco, prior to the stemming
process, for use as cigar wrapper tobacco". (b)  Effective 1/1/78, Sec 13(b)(22) is
repealed. (c)  
The principles in
IB 780.500 - 780.522 apply.
html:
(a)   Sec 13(b)(22) provided an OT exemption for "Any agricultural employee employed in the growing and harvesting of shade-grown tobacco who is engaged in the processing (including, but not limited to, drying, curing, fermenting, bulking, rebulking, sorting, grading, aging, and baling) of such tobacco, prior to the stemming process, for use as cigar wrapper tobacco".

 

(b)  Effective 1/1/78, Sec 13(b)(22) is repealed.

 

(c)   The principles in IB 780.500 - 780.522 apply.
